short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for products and calculate prices
short.vi: tìm kiếm sản phẩm và tính toán giá

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Picturestees Clothing LLC has created a Chrome browser extension to optimize the shopping and price calculation experience on their website. This utility provides an intuitive and easy-to-use interface, helping users search for products and calculate prices at a stable rate.

Feature:

Search product:

Users can enter search keywords in the "Search Products" box and press the "Search" button to redirect to the Picturestees website with the corresponding search results.
Price Calculation:

Users can enter quantity and select products from the list to calculate the estimated price.
Each product has a corresponding price range displayed after calculation, helping users easily evaluate the expected cost.
Friendly interface:

The interface is clean and user-friendly, with gradient background colors and Picturestees representative images.
Buttons and input boxes are easy to see and use, helping users interact conveniently.
Detailed Product Information:

When calculating the price for a specific product, the widget displays detailed information and descriptions about the product, helping users better understand the product before deciding to buy.
This Chrome Extension helps optimize the shopping and price calculation process, providing a convenient experience for Picturestees Clothing LLC users when using the Chrome browser.

Contact for application comments at:
- Address: "5200 Lankershim Blvd, North Hollywood, CA 91601, United States"
- Email: sales@picturestees.com
